data.name: Happy's Humble Burger Farm: Mutual Decline (OST)
data.detailed_description: Mutual Decline continues the introspective, ambient IDM grooves, but introduces a bit more melody, and a whole lot more optimism. It also introduces a Vaporwave vibe, building off a ‘90s electronica sound.
data.about_the_game: Mutual Decline continues the introspective, ambient IDM grooves, but introduces a bit more melody, and a whole lot more optimism. It also introduces a Vaporwave vibe, building off a ‘90s electronica sound.
data.short_description: Mutual Decline continues the introspective, ambient IDM grooves, but introduces a bit more melody, and a whole lot more optimism. It also introduces a Vaporwave vibe, building off a ‘90s electronica sound.
